description: The Secret to Perfect Cakes Everytime You BakeHaving trouble making the perfect cake?  Are your cakes always flat? Do you use the wrong measurements when baking? With the KitchenMade™ stainless steel measuring cups you can have the same best results everytime you cook. Guessing ingredient quantities will be a thing of the past and no scales are required.Why Choose The KitchenMade™ Measuring Cup Set?We pride ourselves in providing high quality products and insist on the best finely polished 18/8 stainless steel, so our cups have no sharp edges and are easy to clean. The measurements are engraved onto the cups so for years to come you will still be able to read them.The perfectly proportioned handle makes scooping out dry ingredients easy. Accurate measurements in six different cup sizes makes baking a breeze.Our FDA approved stainless steel is the perfect option if you're one of the many people trying to avoid plastics in the home and around your food.Benefits Of Our KitchenMade Measuring Cups-Saves You Money - made of unbreakable, polished heavy duty stainless steel, the only set of measuring cups you ever need to buy-Precision Measurements - to ensure perfect baking every time-Nest Together and Compact - for easy storage-Don't tip over - the cups have flat bases and are accurately weighted-Pouring Lip - especially useful when liquids have to be added slowly-Super Polished Exterior - makes these cups stylishSave Your Money These Are The Only Set Of Measuring Cups You Ever Need to BuyNo need to waste any more time and money trying inferior products as we guarantee KitchenMade™ Measuring Cups. We're so confident in our products that we offer a Lifetime Guarantee, 100% Satisfaction or your money back.SPECIAL OFFER - FREE Baking eBook! Get Yours Now. CLICK ADD TO CART.
title: KitchenMade Stainless Steel Measuring Cups - Set of 6 - Best Quality 18/8 Polished SS - Great Design Made to Nest One Piece Inside the Other - Compact Stackable Cups - Perfect for Home Cooking and Baking - Sturdy Enough for Commercial Kitchens - USA Standard Cup Sizes - No Hassle Lifetime Guarantee
